metadata.title: CVE-2022-38229 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: XPDF commit ffaf11c was discovered to contain a heap-buffer overflow viaDCTStream::readHuffSym(DCTHuffTable*) at /xpdf/Stream.cc.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
